name: Sunlight Serenade
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Immediately cast a tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 Radiant spell you know. They must deal damage and can't require concentration. You do not pay MP costs for these spells and treat them all as if you spent 3 AP to cast them. You choose the order in which each spell takes effect.

After using this spell once, the MP cost is doubled until you take a break or rest.
